version_description:
Hi, it's cool that you're reading this, but to the point:
- The game has a room constructor! Now the whole room is yours!
- Minor translation corrections;
- Minor edits;

Hi, it's cool that you're reading this, but to the point:
- The game has a room constructor! Now the whole room is yours!
- Minor translation corrections;
- Minor edits;
This version has translations into new languages. Plus we have fixed the bugs.
This version has translations into new languages. Plus we have fixed the bugs.

The holiday is coming to us!
What's this? WOW, A LITTLE HAT ON THE CAT!!!
Happy new year, chief! Good luck in the coming year

And also:
- Added boosters for each phone and console;
- Updated top games;
- When opening packs with employees, more information about them is now given;
